pkgmetadata.longdescription: Accelerated Derivative-Free Method for Large-Scale Nonlinear Systems of Equations // Secant acceleration applied to derivative-free Spectral Residual Methods for solving large- scale nonlinear systems of equations. The main references follows: W. La Cruz, J. M. Martinez, and M. Raydan (2006) doi:10.1090/S0025-5718-06-01840-0; E. G. Birgin and J. M. Martinez (2022) doi:10.1137/20M1388024.
